product.name: Apple
product.description: A round fruit with red, green, or yellow skin and a white inside. Crisp and juicy.

product.name: Banana
product.description: A curved fruit with a yellow skin and a soft inside. Sweet and creamy.

product.name: Carrot
product.description: A long, orange root vegetable with a sweet taste. Rich in vitamin A.

product.name: Broccoli
product.description: A green vegetable with a tree-like shape. High in fiber and vitamin C.

product.name: Spinach
product.description: A leafy green vegetable with a slightly bitter taste. Rich in iron and antioxidants.

product.name: Oatmeal
product.description: A hot cereal made from ground oats. High in fiber and protein.

product.name: Brown Rice
product.description: A whole grain rice with a nutty flavor. High in fiber and minerals.

product.name: Quinoa
product.description: A gluten-free grain with a slightly nutty taste. Rich in protein and minerals.

product.name: Cinnamon
product.description: A sweet and spicy bark used as a flavoring. Contains antioxidants.

product.name: Turmeric
product.description: A yellow spice used in Indian cuisine. Contains anti-inflammatory compounds.

product.name: Garlic
product.description: A pungent bulb used in many dishes. Contains compounds with health benefits.

product.name: Ginger
product.description: A root with a spicy and slightly sweet taste. Used in cooking and medicine.

product.name: Sweet Potato
product.description: A starchy root vegetable with a sweet taste. Rich in fiber and vitamins.

product.name: Cauliflower
product.description: A white vegetable with a mild taste. High in fiber and vitamin C.

product.name: Almond
product.description: A nut with a crunchy texture and a mild, nutty taste. Rich in healthy fats and antioxidants.

product.name: Peanut
product.description: A legume with a crunchy texture and a slightly sweet taste. Rich in protein and healthy fats.

product.name: Walnut
product.description: A nut with a rich, buttery taste. High in healthy fats and antioxidants.

product.name: Grapes
product.description: Juicy and flavorful, great for snacking or making wine.

product.name: Pineapple
product.description: Sweet and tropical, great in smoothies or as a dessert.

product.name: Watermelon
product.description: Juicy and refreshing, perfect for hot summer days.

product.name: Kale
product.description: Nutritious and versatile, great in salads or smoothies.

product.name: Lettuce
product.description: Crisp and refreshing, perfect for salads or sandwiches.

product.name: Oats
product.description: Heart-healthy and filling, perfect for breakfast.

product.name: Rice
product.description: Versatile and filling, great in stir-fries or as a side dish.

product.name: Wheat
product.description: Nutritious and versatile, great in breads or as a side dish.

product.name: Corn
